name: This is how I roll
description:
A die/dice rolling puzzle platformer! Roll fast, to change the die face, and smash the matching blocks! Smash all blocks to progress. 
NOTE: If a level is too difficult, you can skip to the next level... through the options menu in each level (press ESC).

GMTK Game Jam 2022 submission, theme: Roll of the Dice.

How to play:
Left, Right arrows/A, D - Move left and right
Up arrow/W - Jump
Down arrow/S - Drop from ceiling
R - Restart Level
Escape - Options menu

Tips:
- You can jump after touching a platform's horizontal surface (ground/ceiling). Try jumping from underneath a platform.
- Spin and speed is conserved in the air (great for direction changes without losing momentum)
- Chain block matches to get spin boosts. 
- Restart level, and experiment.

Thank you so much for playing :)
